On #InternationalWomensDay we celebrate the incredible contributions women have made throughout history and continue to make here at home and globally. I remain committed to ensuring that every woman and girl has an equal opportunity to fulfill her God-given potential.

Everyone should pay attention to what is happening to our courts because this will impact us for generations to come. This Administration is committed to transforming our courts with extreme nominees who will bring bias to the bench. I’ll do everything I can to stop them.

Puerto Rico needs food assistance funding due to the hurricanes which devastated the island. Some 1.4 million U.S. citizens will face large cuts to their food assistance benefits, 230,000 will lose the benefits entirely. We must act now to end this crisis. https://twitter.com/JStein_WaPo/status/1104086113625399296 QT @JStein_WaPo 🚨🚨🚨NEW: PUERTO RICAN OFFICIALS confirm they have started cutting food stamp benefits used by more than 1 million ppl

Congress has failed to act despite months of warnings

Trump had opposed fix but is now reportedly on board Senate GOP plan

RT @jacobsoboroff @AOC .@AOC is right. 

Cities like Baltimore, as we showed on @TODAYshow yesterday, need money *now* to stop people from dying of ODs.

A true national emergency POTUS must address.

A border wall, on the other hand, will save exactly zero lives from OD today. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D1DweN7WkAELOF0.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1103645725232152576/vid/320x180/gSA2NZy-_56C15Lm.mp4?tag=9

There’s nothing partisan about wanting a system where health care isn’t based on how much money you have or the area you live in. I support Medicare for All because health care shouldn’t be a function of your bank account.

Today we said hello to seniors in Iowa and heard about their pressing concerns. 

We are going to lower prescription drug prices, expand Medicare to cover hearing aids, dental and vision care and expand Social Security. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D1KO54WXcAAAIpv.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D1KO55mWwAAIfNu.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D1KO54SWkAYTdW4.jpg

RT @harrisonjaime .@bradyqg is one of the brightest stars ⭐️ in the Democratic Party!  He can teach a @masterclass on how to build an effective county party!  @CoryBooker congratulations on this big pickup!  @KimpsonForSC big shoes to fill down there brother!
